vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
Unitroller.fallback (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2969-2984) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = comptrollerImplementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2971-2973)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
UnitrollerAdminStorage.comptrollerImplementation (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2681-2683) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- _becomeG6 (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4353-4366)
	- adminOrInitializing (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4368-4372)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
ComptrollerCertora.switcher (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4788) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getHypotheticalAccountLiquidityInternal (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4790-4805)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
ComptrollerCertora.liquidityOrShortfall (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4788-4790) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getHypotheticalAccountLiquidityInternal (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4790-4805)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Comp.getChainId (ComptrollerCertora.sol#3281-3288) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1152-1214) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1178)
	-transferFrom (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1192)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
Comp._writeCheckpoint (ComptrollerCertora.sol#3247-3260) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._addReservesInternal (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2435-2447):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2436-2437)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2443-2444)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._reduceReserves (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2498-2508):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2499-2500)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2505-2506)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setComptroller (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2367-2386):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2375-2376)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2378-2379)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModel (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2563-2573):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2564-2565)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2570-2571)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2570-2571)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2579-2609):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newInterestRateModel.isInterestRateModel(),marker method returned false) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2598-2600)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2601-2603)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reserveFactorMantissa (ComptrollerCertora.sol#2398-2399)

Reentrancy in Comptroller._supportMarket (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4221-4241):
	External calls:
	- cToken.isCToken() (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4230)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- markets (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4232-4234)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.accrueInterest (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1599-1677):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1616)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1668)
	- borrowIndex (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1669)
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1670)
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1671)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.borrowInternal (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1929-1937):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1930)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1936)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerCertora.sol#1936)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Comptroller.distributeMarketComp (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4472-4539):
	External calls:
	- holderHoldings = CToken(cToken).balanceOf(holder) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4508-4509)
	- holderHoldings = div_(CToken(cToken).borrowBalanceStored(holder),marketBorrowIndex) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4510-4512)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- compAccrued (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4529-4531)
	- compVesting (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4522-4525)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Comptroller.distributeMarketComp (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4472-4539):
	External calls:
	- holderHoldings = CToken(cToken).balanceOf(holder) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4508-4509)
	- holderHoldings = div_(CToken(cToken).borrowBalanceStored(holder),marketBorrowIndex) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4510-4512)
	- compAccrued[holder] = grantCompInternal(holder,holderAccrued) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4527-4528)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- compAccrued (ComptrollerCertora.sol#4527-4528)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Comptroller.exitMarket (ComptrollerCertora.sol#3470-3522):
	External calls:
	- (oErr,tokensHeld,amountOwed) = cToken.getAccountSnapshot(msg.sender) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#3473-3474)
	- allowed = redeemAllowedInternal(cTokenAddress,msg.sender,tokensHeld) (ComptrollerCertora.sol#3482-3483)
